title: Sales Force Automation
description: Mobile-first sales tracking application with real-time location tracking, customer management, and offline-first architecture.
summary: Mobile-first sales tracking application with real-time location tracking, customer management, and offline-first architecture.

challenges.solution: Implemented multi-source location tracking combining GPS, WiFi, and cell tower data for reliable positioning in urban environments.
Built a robust offline-first database with automatic sync when connectivity resumes, ensuring no sales data is ever lost.
Integrated Google Maps API with custom algorithms to suggest optimal visit routes, reducing travel time by 25%.
Designed a real-time inventory sync system allowing sales reps to check stock availability instantly.

outcome: The Sales Force app has transformed field sales operations, enabling real-time visibility into sales activities and improving team productivity by 35%. The offline-first approach ensures reliable operation in areas with poor connectivity.
